attributes.action: prevent any review of the death penalty as a punishment for treason until after a judicial review has been heard, in the future, over the conduct of himself and 310 other elected representatives who might be found, by that inquiry, to have committed treason by voting, on 5th March 2008, for the signing away of the sovereignty of this country to politicians elected (or appointed) in other foreign countries.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
